title: DPS BestOf
itunes:title: DPS BestOf
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP shares some advice with Adam Lefkoe for covering the NFL Draft for Bleacher Report tonight. NFL Network Analyst Daniel Jeremiah tells us which prospect he thinks has the highest ceiling but is most risky. And Hall of Fame Basketball Player Allen Iverson joins DP for a fun interview where they talk about everything from his practice press conference, to where wanted to go to College originally. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP shares some advice with Adam Lefkoe for covering the NFL Draft for Bleacher Report tonight. NFL Network Analyst Daniel Jeremiah tells us which prospect he thinks has the highest ceiling but is most risky. And Hall of Fame Basketball Player Allen Iverson joins DP for a fun interview where they talk about everything from his practice press conference, to where wanted to go to College originally.
